Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Anti-ice system insufficient heating. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective De-icing System component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 04/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon
